          <title>
            <string language="hu">Vízibolha testfelépítése</string>
            <string language="en">Build of water flea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bau des Wasserflohs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construction de puce de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Configuração da pulga da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Configurazione della pulce dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή του ψύλλου ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura de la pulga del agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A vízibolha testfelépítését szemléltető rajz</string>
            <string language="en">Illustrating picture of water flea's build</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">rákok,  ízeltlábúak,  vízibolha,  Daphnia,  </string>
            <string language="en">crabs, arthropedals, water flea, Daphnia</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Veranschaulichung der Abbildung des Baus des 
Wasserflohs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Illustration de l'image de la construction de la 
puce de l'eau</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ilustrando o retrato da configuração da pulga da 
água</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrare immagine di configurazione della pulce
dell'acqua</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επεξήγηση της εικόνας της κατασκευής του ψύλλου 
ύδατος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ilustrar el cuadro de la estructura de la pulga 
del agua</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krabben, arthropedals, Wasserfloh, Daphnia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">crabes, arthropedals, puce de l'eau, daphnie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">granchi, arthropedals, pulce dell'acqua, dafnia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καβούρια, arthropedals, ψύλλος ύδατος, δάφνια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cangrejos, arthropedals, pulga del agua, daphnia</string>
